author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...POORLY ORGANIZED RAYMOND MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD PARALLEL TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING IN AREAS OF HIGHER TERRAIN THROUGH SATURDAY...
summary: ...POORLY ORGANIZED RAYMOND MOVING WEST-NORTHWESTWARD PARALLEL TO THE SOUTHWESTERN COAST OF MEXICO... ...RISK OF FLASH FLOODING IN AREAS OF HIGHER TERRAIN THROUGH SATURDAY... As of 9:00 PM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Raymond was located near 16.7, -102.6 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

As of 9:00 PM CST Thu Oct 09 the center of Raymond was located near 16.7, -102.6 with movement WNW at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1002 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Raymond (EP2/EP172025)
